labels.name: priority: critical
labels.description: Priority level - highest priority and urgent

labels.name: priority: high
labels.description: Priority level - takes precedence over medium and low priority issues

labels.name: priority: medium
labels.description: Priority level - default priority and indicates priority level has been determined

labels.name: priority: low
labels.description: Priority level - lowest priority and should not take precedence over higher priority issues

labels.name: blocked
labels.description: Status - issue is blocked by another issue or dependency

labels.name: blocker
labels.description: Status - issue is blocking other issue(s)

labels.name: stalled
labels.description: Status - work lacks documented progress

labels.name: question
labels.description: Status - a comment in this issue or pull request contains a request for further information

labels.name: needs estimate
labels.description: Status - please apply an estimate to this issue before proceeding

labels.name: changes requested
labels.description: Status - additional work is necessary

labels.name: has workaround
labels.description: Status - an alternative solution has been provided for the issue

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: Status - comparable issue or pull request already exists

labels.name: pattern
labels.description: Job type: Front-end - development work in pattern library

labels.name: theming
labels.description: Job type: Front-end - development work in Drupal theme

labels.name: migration
labels.description: Job type: Back-end - development work with Drupal Migrate API

labels.name: drupal
labels.description: Job type: Back-end - Drupal site-building work

labels.name: ux/design
labels.description: Job type: Design - creation of design artifacts, often outside of codebase

labels.name: post-migration
labels.description: Job type: Content - work that needs to be performed after the migration

labels.name: translation
labels.description: Job type: Content - requires translation of content to another language

labels.name: content
labels.description: Job type: Content - requires adding or updating content within the Drupal CMS

labels.name: documentation
labels.description: Job type: Other - work related to documentation outside of Drupal UI

labels.name: deployment
labels.description: DevOps - issue type used to track preparation and deployment of release to an environment

labels.name: has manual deployment
labels.description: DevOps - a manual deployment step has been documented in the pull request description

labels.name: hotfix
labels.description: DevOps - deploy changes independently of work on scheduled release in develop branch

labels.name: infrastructure
labels.description: DevOps - setup or management of local, hosting or continuous integration environments

labels.name: epic
labels.description: Planning - epic issues track the progress of multiple issues and can span releases (from ZenHub)

labels.name: sprint planning
labels.description: Planning - work related to project planning

labels.name: retrospective
labels.description: Planning - issue thread dedicated to sprint or project retrospectives

labels.name: user story
labels.description: Planning - issue follows user story template: As a <user type>, I want to <task> so that <goal>

labels.name: revise issue
labels.description: Planning - issue description is vague, incomplete, or inaccurate

labels.name: security
labels.description: Supplementary - work related to security updates, audits or enhancements

labels.name: seo
labels.description: Supplementary - work specifically targeting Search Engine Optimization

labels.name: social
labels.description: Supplementary - implements social sharing features or analytics

labels.name: performance
labels.description: Supplementary - front-end or back-end performance improvements

labels.name: x-browser: edge
labels.description: Supplementary - cross-browser compatibility for MS Edge

labels.name: x-browser: ie10
labels.description: Supplementary - cross-browser compatibility for MS Internet Explorer 10

labels.name: x-browser: ie11
labels.description: Supplementary - cross-browser compatibility for MS Internet Explorer 11

labels.name: x-browser: safari
labels.description: Supplementary - cross-browser compatibility for Safari

labels.name: maintenance program
labels.description: Supplementary - monthly maintenance work

labels.name: discovery
labels.description: Supplementary - discovery and prototyping work

labels.name: multilingual
labels.description: Supplementary - work related to multilingual development

labels.name: search
labels.description: Supplementary - work related to internal site search
